    • Method Detail

      • processReinforce

        protected AIOperation processReinforce(AIController api)
        Description copied from class: AI
        Perform the reinforce operation using the specified AIController. This operation should be specific to the specialised instance of the AI.

        Key aspects:
        • Only reinforce the selected Country ONCE.
        • The operation should be completely functional and rely on ANY data that is not provided by the AIController.
        • The selected Country must be owned by the current Player which can be retrieved using AIController.getCurrentPlayer().
        This method must:
        1. Select a Country by adding one Country to AIOperation.select that is returned.
        2. Set AIOperation.processAgain, which is whether or not this AI wishes to perform another operation or not. If not the AIController
        Specified by:
        processReinforce in class AI
        Parameters:
        api - AIController
        Returns:
        The AIOperation for this AI's reinforce.

      • processFortify

        public AIOperation processFortify(AIController api)
        Description copied from class: AI
        Perform the fortify operation using the specified AIController. This operation should be specific to the specialised instance of the AI.

        Key aspects:
        • Only fortify the target Country ONCE.
        • The operation should be completely functional and rely on NO data that is not provided by the AIController.
        • The primary Country must have more than a one unit army.
        • The primary and target Countrys must be owned by the same Player.
        • The target Country must have a valid path between is and the primary Country. Use AIController.isPathBetween(Country, Country) to check this.

        This method must:
        1. Select a primary Country by adding it first to AIOperation.select that is returned.
        2. Select a target Country by adding it second to AIOperation.select that is returned.
        3. Set AIOperation.processAgain, which is whether or not this AI wishes to perform another operation or not. If not the AIController
        The order that the Countrys are selected matters. The primary Country MUST be selected first.
        Specified by:
        processFortify in class AI
        Parameters:
        api - AIController
        Returns:
        The AIOperation for this AI's fortify.
